children.name: enable_overrides
children.label: Enable Overrides
children.help_text: Toggle to override section ID and vertical margin.

children.name: section_id
children.label: Section ID
children.help_text: The value you type here will be the anchor link for this section. Should be all lowercase and include dashes instead of spaces. This should be a unique value per module.
